functions.name: getLPTokenValue
functions.vulnerability: Uses instantaneous pool reserves to calculate LP token value, vulnerable to flash loan manipulation

functions.name: borrow
functions.vulnerability: Relies on manipulatable LP token valuation to determine borrowing capacity

ground_truth.root_cause: LP token value was calculated directly from current Uniswap pool reserves without using time-weighted average prices (TWAP) or external oracles. Flash loan attackers could temporarily manipulate pool reserves within a single transaction, inflating the perceived value of LP tokens and overborrowing against them.
ground_truth.attack_vector: 1) Flash loan 5M DAI. 2) Swap DAI -> ETH in Uniswap pool, heavily imbalancing reserves (6M DAI, 100 ETH). 3) LP token value calculation uses manipulated reserves, showing inflated value. 4) Deposit LP tokens as collateral in Warp Finance. 5) Borrow maximum stablecoins based on inflated collateral valuation (2-3x more than true value). 6) Swap back to rebalance pool. 7) Repay flash loan. 8) Keep overborrowed funds. Loss: $7.7M.

exploit_info.protocol_name: Warp Finance LP Token Price Manipulation

public_exposure.exposure_notes: Famous Warp Finance LP Token Price Manipulation exploit

evaluation_support.original_exploit_name: Warp Finance LP Token Price Manipulation
